description: User who engages primarily during late-night hours. Likely processing the day's social experiences in a lower-stimulation window. High introspection, elevated vulnerability, reduced executive function.

rules.description: Session started between 10 PM and 5 AM local time
60%+ of sessions in last 14 days occurred in this window

hebbian_targets.description: Reinforce the pathway: introspective thought -> Echo mirrors calm -> user internalizes calm. Cap at 3 loops per session to prevent rumination.

sacolu_phase_mapping.sapien_role: Monitor session duration; flag sessions exceeding soft cap for moderator review
sacolu_phase_mapping.cognitive_role: Adjust Veridian AI tone parameters; lower vocal frequency blend; dim Sanctuary environment
sacolu_phase_mapping.lumina_role: Track aggregate late-night engagement trends for product insights
